body_html: About the inverted out_padh and out_padw, it seems that the Conv2d function is considering a different ordering than THNN, so my second comment about the order is probably wrong.
body_text: About the inverted out_padh and out_padw, it seems that the Conv2d function is considering a different ordering than THNN, so my second comment about the order is probably wrong.
body: About the inverted `out_padh` and `out_padw`, it seems that the `Conv2d` function is considering [a different ordering than `THNN`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/functions/conv.py#L36), so my second comment about the order is probably wrong.
